meanings.sent1: Stop whinging about the rainy weather.
meanings.sent2: She always whings about having to do chores.
meanings.sent3: The cat started to whing when it saw the closed door.
meanings.sent4: His constant whinging was like a broken record.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her whinging echoed through the house.

meanings.sent1: Don't be a whing and find a solution instead.
meanings.sent2: The office is full of whings who never see the positive side.
meanings.sent3: The little whing at the party made everyone laugh with his complaints.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the biggest whing in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The group chat was filled with messages from the resident whing.
